formalpara.title: Figure 1. Structural diversity of the cadherin superfamily in C. elegans
formalpara.para: The 13 C. elegans cadherins are grouped according to their structural similarity with cadherins from other organisms. Each cadherin is positioned with its N-terminus to the left. PCCD = primitive classic cadherin domain (formerly termed non-chordate classic cadherin domain, it has also now been found in chordate classic cadherins).
